data.title: See the Command & Conquer Remastered Collection Reveal Trailer
data.meta_description: Watch the new Command & Conquer Remastered official reveal trailer and pre-order the digital Standard Edition or one of two physical collector’s editions today!
data.text:
Can you believe it’s been 25 years since one of the most beloved real-time strategy games in history first hit computer screens worldwide? A lot’s changed since then, but the passion of the army of Command & Conquer™ fans isn’t one of them.

From the first announcement through today, the community’s enthusiasm and creativity have helped shape the remastered experience. The former Westwood Studios™ team members at Petroglyph Games worked alongside this dedicated community to recreate every game element in authentic and stunning 4k detail. And that includes the completely remastered, legendary soundtrack by Frank Klepacki!

Now it’s time to share the full experience with the world. Let Producer Jim Vessella give you an in-depth look at the Command & Conquer™ Remastered Collection in the official reveal trailer below:

Pre-Orders and Editions

The Command & Conquer Remastered Collection launches June 5, 2020, but you can pre-order the digital Standard Edition now on Origin or Steam! Prefer a physical big-box copy of the game? Pre-orders are also available for two collector’s editions via Limited Run Games. But be aware, collector’s edition pre-orders close April 10, 2020, at 11:59 p.m. EST, so don’t miss out!

Both the digital Standard Edition and physical collector's editions include the remastered versions of Tiberian Dawn and Red Alert, plus all three expansion packs (Covert Operations, Counterstrike, and The Aftermath), and tons of bonus features and improvements.

PC Specs and Requirements

Want to be ready to take command on launch day? Head over to the PC Specs and Requirements page to find out what you'll need to start your rise to power on the battlefield.

The Campaign Begins Soon

Get ready to choose your side and lead your troops into battle. Will you crush your enemies or fall to their superior strategy and might? Your destiny awaits – embrace it starting June 5!

Welcome back, Commander.

Pre-order the digital Standard Edition now on Origin or Steam, or one of the physical collector’s editions from Limited Run Games. The Command & Conquer Remastered Collection launches on June 5, 2020.
